name: Speedrun (Games Made Quick III Pre-Alpha Edition)
name_original: Speedrun (Games Made Quick III Pre-Alpha Edition)
description:
You stole the Time Gem. You are now an outlaw. The King has forced you into exile. What now?

This is a prototype copy of the game made during the Games Made Quick III game jam. This is my first public game so please ignore the errors, but still msg me about them.
